argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mulsubfacd.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | mulsubfacd.2 | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | #P_ax1cn | |- 1 e. CC |
| 4 | 3 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> 1 e. CC ) |
| 5 | 1, 4, 2 | #P_subdird | |- ( ph -> ( ( A - 1 ) x. B ) = ( ( A x. B ) - ( 1 x. B ) ) ) |
| 6 | 2 | #P_mulid2d | |- ( ph -> ( 1 x. B ) = B ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( ( A x. B ) - ( 1 x. B ) ) = ( ( A x. B ) - B ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_eqtr2d | |- ( ph -> ( ( A x. B ) - B ) = ( ( A - 1 ) x. B ) ) |
